Well it was such in amazing experience..
Staff are really very cooperative friendly are helpfull..
Receptionist ibrar sb is such a nice person as he was always there to help us for any sort of query..
Highly recommend for families ..
One of my best experience  of living in hotel oriel islamabad..
Wifi speed is very good free and safe parking..
Location is very excellent  top roof open and all islamabad mountains amazing view..
Near by sirinagar highway and all visiting point near by this hotel..
Over all facilities  very excellent..

‚ÄúI had a great stay at Hotel Orial in Islamabad. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The location is convenient, close to restaurants and shops. Overall, a very pleasant experience. I would definitely recommend it!‚Äù

I visited hotel oriel Islamabad this weekend with my family and I found it very luxury ,neat clean and fresh environment ,each everything was excellent..
Bed matress,pillows are of good quality..
Ac was working very good and special thanks to manager Ahmad abbasi Sahab for compensated us in very reasonable price see you soon inshaAllah on our next visits..

The hotel has a good location, and food and drinks are easily available nearby. However, the room is not airy and feels very narrow. Additionally, if you request the air conditioning to be turned on, they charge an extra 2000. On the hotel‚Äôs website, the room price is listed less than 3000, but they demand 3500 and then reduce it to 3000. I'm not satisfied üòî

I stayed at hotel oriel in islamabad and had a wonderfull experience.. The location is excellent  the service are great,and it is a complete family hotel..neat and cleans rooms staff are very helpfull and friendly .. I would highly recommend  ut to families and travelers..
‚ÄúOur room was spotless and cleaned daily to perfection. The housekeeping team was courteous and responsive to our requests. Truly felt like a home away from home.‚Äù

Stay with my family in summer vocation,really a home away from home,very cooperative and nice staff,24/7 reception available,neat and clean rooms with very good air conditioner facility,tasty food restaurants on door step,if we come on location every tourist spot and visiting places are very near to hotel,thanx hotel oriel,thanx Mr Ahmed Abbasi for ur cooperation.

Hotel oriel is a fantastic place to stay in islamabad..the rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff is professional and attentive..the hotel oriel is located in a Peaceful environment with safe and sound

Really good experience.
Had to find something to crash with family after 11pm.
Inexpensive and very clean rooms.
Highly recommended.
Very nice hotel,I recommend this hotel,I always choose this hotel.his staff is very honest and helpful.room is very neat and clean.please visit this hotel.

"We stayed at the Oriel Hotel, and I was incredibly impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere.The staff were attentive, friendly, and always willing to help with any request. They  made me feel like a valued guest, not just a room number. This level of personalized service is rare. Whether you're a local guest or traveling from abroad, you'll find a genuine sense of warmth here.
If you're looking for a hotel that offers more than just a place to sleep , the Oriel Hotel is an excellent choice. The 'family-like behavior' of the staff makes it a standout experience.specially I would suggest to female to stay here without any worries ,I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a comfortable and welcoming stay."
It's a good house as comparison to prices it's a cheap and best choice for those who are looking for a budgeted hotel
Worst place.Jo  koi bht hi tang ha dunya se wohi ja k rahe udr .No food available there only chai pakory wo b kachy and the 2 hours jeep ride is not worth the view because there is no view only trees

I recently stayed in Room 107 while the room was affordable, the overall experience was disappointing. The location isn't ideal, as it's situated near car workshops, which can be noisy and inconvenient. The ambiance of the hotel felt quite basic and lacked charm. Additionally, the blanket in the room had visible stains, which was off-putting. The washroom had a strong, unpleasant odor that made it uncomfortable to use. Overall, the stay did not meet my expectations

I had a fantastic stay at oriel hotel. From the moment I arrived the staff were incredibly welcoming and helpful. My room was spotless comfortable and had every thing I needed. The location is perfect peaceful and quiet. Recommended definitely.
It‚Äôs a very lovely hotel, and the food is very delicious. Everything is available there, and the rooms are very spacious.
I had a fantastic stay at oriel hotel from the moment i arrived the staff were incredibly welcoming  helpful the location is perfect peaceful and quied recommended definitely  thnks hotel oriel
I stay here with my family ,thie is a best resturant we realy enjoy

A budget hotel. Location is dhaba style. Restaurants nearby provide tasty food but overall ambience is low. I stayed one night with family and then moved to another hotel. Its ok hotel. Bedsheets were a bit stained. Washroom was smelly. If you can afford move on. If on budget its good.
Nice and neet cleen hotel and Best rooms and delicious foods.
